current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from enforcing
		  the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and
		  Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read the first time

action-desc.#text:
Read the second time and placed on the

Keep the IRS Off Your Health Care Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
admitted that it singled out advocacy groups, based on ideology,
			 seeking tax-exempt status.
